https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aoFaaChn9gSXvawMwxNO5G8clGy.jpg Anto is a soft spoken and uncomforming 15 year old boy with a long time crush, Rani. But after having several homoerotic dreams, involving a naked man, he became questioning his sexual orientation. Especially when his best friend, Rudi bluntly told Anto he might be gay for having those dreams. Boy Crush
